original_text:
Moses and Aaron were among his priests,
    Samuel also was among those who called upon his name.
    They called to the Lord, and he answered them.
korean_text: 그의 제사장들 중에는 모세와 아론이 있고 그의 이름을 부르는 자들 중에는 사무엘이 있도다 그들이 여호와께 간구하매 응답하셨도다

sentences.original_text: Moses and Aaron were among his priests
sentences.korean_translation: 모세와 아론은 그의 제사장 중에 있었으며

sentences.original_text: Samuel also was among those who called upon his name
sentences.korean_translation: 사무엘도 그의 이름을 부른 자들 중에 있었습니다
